titles.title: To establish a commission to study the establishment of a national education museum and archive for the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

committee.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
committee.name: House Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 6/14/2000--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Education to appoint a national commission, including representatives from both the public and private sectors, to study the development, creation, and operation of a national education museum and archive.
